channel.title: F.S.Bellelli
channel.description: This is the personal website of Francesco. S. Bellelli. From time to time, I post about things that I find interesting or about some recent work I have been doing.

item.title: Mishmash of charts
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: This article is a selected collection of charts that I prepared over the last three years.

item.title: The 2021 World Trade Report is out
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: I had the honour to contribute to the writing of this year's edition of the World Trade Report, the flagship economic publication of the World Trade Organization. The report explores the role of trade, trade policy and international cooperation in building economic resilience in a world marked by increasing risks. In this article, I briefly outline my contributions on risk trends and policy responses to shocks.

item.title: All you need to know about the Paris Agreement ahead of COP26
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: Only one week left to the official start of the COP26 in Glasgow, in which global leaders will meet to take crucial decisions on climate change. Scientific evidence shows that we are running out of time. If we wish to avoid the worst scenario, it's now or never. What will come out of the summit? Will it be a flop or a success? We don't know yet, but this article will quickly get you up to speed with climate talks.

item.title: How has the pandemic affected the office space market?
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: In this post I have a look at data from the City of London to understand how the pandemic has impacted the office market.

item.title: The fascinating world of Voronoi diagrams
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: In this article I explain what is a Vornoi diagram and why they are amazing

item.title: Worldata
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: I am working on an R package designed to quickly wrangle, merge and explore country data

item.title: TileMaster: a strategy game in Shiny
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: I created a small strategy game with RStudios' Shiny platform. If it can run a data dashboard, why not a strategy game?

item.title: How to increase participation in environmental agreements?
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: Understanding the determinants of participation in environmental agreements can help us frame more successful agreements. In this article, I discuss the economic theory and empirical evidence on this topic.

item.title: Watercolours
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
Lily Runkun Tian
item.description: A gallery displaying some of the artistic creations of Francesco and Lily

item.title: Mappa licita naturale
item.dc:creator: Francesco S. Bellelli
item.description: Mappa di un sistema di licita naturale lungo-corto a bridge
